Read Excel Files:
	input files end with {suffix}.xlsx 
	Consider  "{sheetname}" sheet in input files
	Confirm the columns "{column1, column2,...etc}" exist in the input files.
        Remove all special characters from the {column_name}. This include:
            Periods .
            Hyphens -
            Any other punctuation symbols
	    Do not remove spaces.
	Process the input files one by one
Save the output files as {input_filename}.xlsx
